1.speaker: Digi
1.transcript: In this game, we decided to make it suck. No one had to play this game, so it didn't have to be good. That was our philosophy going into it.

newplan.speaker: Digi
newplan.transcript: This is the only route in the game that I was the writing director for. Pakoo basically handled all the other ones, except for a few exceptions.

newplan.speaker: Digi
newplan.transcript: I hope that that doesn't mean that this route has a vastly different writing style than the rest of the game, though. Worked really hard to try to match it.

hitme.speaker: Digi
hitme.transcript: This MIDI of {i}Hit Me With Your Best Shot{/i} is hilariously bad, but we didn't want to get CS copyright struck.

everlong.speaker: Digi
everlong.transcript: For the backing track here, I'm pretty sure I asked Pakoo to get 'something like {i}Everlong{/i} by the Foo Fighters', and he just got a MIDI of Everlong. It's pretty funny, though!

madlibs.speaker: Digi
madlibs.transcript: This is where we reveal the gimmick of this route! Basically every route had a gimmick. The True route is a road trip, the fanboy route is an RPG, and this route is a Mad Libs.

madlibs.speaker: Digi
madlibs.transcript: This was inspired by me literally digging through the Ren'Py documentation and figuring out there was a function to store text input into variables. It was all downhill from there!
